alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 19 at 8:40AM EDT until June 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON AND NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA... At 739 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Marianna to 16 miles northeast of Lynn Haven, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sneads, Grand Ridge, Altha, Moose Pond, Chason, Union City, Camps Head, Sink Creek, Center Lake, Willis, Star, Simsville, Cypress, Alliance and White Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
